Content_wSideColumn.BodyCopy:
• Each team shall consist of five (5) players and may begin a game with as few as four (4) players. The maximum number of players allowed on each team shall be nine (9) with at least two (2) players of each gender.
    • Ward team exception: The maximum number of players allowed for ward teams shall be thirteen (13) with at least two (2) players of each gender.
  • A game shall continue if a team drops below four (4) players, however if a team drops down to two (2) players, the referee shall allow the game to continue only if they feel the team still has an opportunity to win.
  • All players must check in using a valid Photo ID.
  • Players must check in at the scorer's table prior to entering the game. The officials will call the player onto the court to substitute during dead balls only.
  • All participants are required to wear legally numbered jerseys (provided) that are the same color during intramural play:
    • Approved BYU-Idaho clothing MUST be worn under Recreational Sports issued jerseys at ALL times.
  • Basketball Competitive Athlete Rule: A student is considered a "competitive player" if they are currently participating in a related sport in the Competitive Sports Program.
    • Beginner: No competitive players allowed in this league.
    • Intermediate: 1 competitive player allowed in this league.
    • Advanced: 2 competitive players allowed in this league.
